body_html:
@zheng-xq Not sure if you have looked into this?

I don't understand the comment about XLA and rewriting though - if the format of the data and filter are canonical, and consistently transformed under the hood to improve performance, it shouldn't make any difference whether the user program has tried to prematurely optimize the layout in a platform-specific manner ;-)

body:
@zheng-xq Not sure if you have looked into this?

I don't understand the comment about XLA and rewriting though - if the format of the data and filter are canonical, and consistently transformed under the hood to improve performance, it shouldn't make any difference whether the user program has tried to prematurely optimize the layout in a platform-specific manner ;-)
